fields.summary: MobileWeb : SearchBar does not appear in portrait but works in landscape mode

comments.body: Not sure what's going on here or where this ticket came from. Mobile Web doesn't even have a search bar implementation. Ti.UI.createSearchBar is undefined.
To clarify, that test app is supposed to crash on line 13. If it doesn't, that means you are using some unofficial 3rd party implementation, which we obviously don't support.

Closing as it is giving the mentioned error of no method 'createSearchBar' at line 13.
Environment used for verification -
Titanium SDK: 3.1.0.v20130228214607
Titanium Â Studio:3.0.2.201302141201
